name: Idle Nine Heavens
description:
Game Features:
1. The player, as a fairy cultivator, travels alone in the alien fairy world and can summon several different fairy cultivators as Taoist companions to assist him in his practice.
2. Rich level choices, there are nine sky challenges and various replica challenges.
3. You can learn casting, treasure, alchemy, refiner and other secondary occupations to earn spiritual stone to enhance your realm.
4. Rich skill system, each win randomly obtain an active skill or passive skill, free combination to play more power.
5. NPC intimacy system, by giving NPC gifts and other means to gain their favor, can unlock exclusive missions and rare items rewards.
6. Magic weapon equipment system, you can build more combinations for players
7. Players in the game can collect a variety of basic material plants for later refining, refining and so on.
8. Boundary system, there are more than 40 major boundary systems.
9. The game has a worship system, players can offer incense to gods. This will increase some special combat effects.
